summary: A woman's one-night stand turns out to be her friend's husband, and a local political candidate.
cast: Annie Heise|Antonio Cupo|Kendra Anderson|Jeremy Guilbaut|Robert Moloney|Tricia Collins|P. Lynn Johnson|Paul Jarrett|Cam Cronin|Heidi Ford|Teach Grant|Roger Haskett|June B. Wilde|Lori Triolo
title: La buena amante
